mapper.insert: INSERT /* com.itsme.letitgo.company.regist.model.mapper.RegistCoMemberMapper#coMemberRegist() */ INTO TBL_MEMBER A ( A.MEM_NO , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_PHONE , A.MEM_KINDS , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE , A.MEM_ENT_YN , A.MEM_ENT_DATE , A.MEM_ENT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , #{ memId } , #{ memEmail } , #{ memPwd } , #{ memName } , #{ memPhone } , '기업회원' , SYSDATE , 'N' , NULL , NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{ memId }
